## SmithyApiDefinition class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Thin wrapper for a Smithy generated OpenAPI JSON spec file. Allows for injection of CDK references into certain sections of the file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SmithyApiDefinition extends apigw.ApiDefinition 
```
**Extends:** apigw.ApiDefinition

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(definition, substitutions)](./smithy-cdk.smithyapidefinition._constructor_.md) |  | **_(BETA)_** Constructs a new instance of the <code>SmithyApiDefinition</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bind(scope)](./smithy-cdk.smithyapidefinition.bind.md) |  | <p>**_(BETA)_** Binds the definition to a SpecRestAPI, substituting provided integrations into the spec JSON.</p><p>If an integration is found for a uri without having credentials already in the spec, then will defer to the integration to create a credentials role.</p> |
